#Installation and other useful files to download

= Downloads =

Refer to the [https://code.google.com/p/echoirlp/wiki/InstallingEchoIRLP installation instructions page] for details on installing EchoIRLP. 

== Useful Files ==

  * [https://echoirlp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/install/echo-install-debian echo-install-debian] - EchoIRLP install script modified to include the Debian IRLP version
  * [https://echoirlp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/install/echo-install echo-irlp-install] - The old echo_install script to install EchoIRLP
  * [https://echoirlp.googlecode.com/files/userdata.txt.example.txt userdata.txt] - example or guide
  * [https://echoirlp.googlecode.com/files/echo_environment.example.txt echo_environment] - example or guide
  * [https://echoirlp.googlecode.com/files/tbd.conf.example.txt tbd.conf] - example or guide for EchoIRLP
